summary: Really fixes Silent Moon Enchant to match what it was meant to be in-game. 100% Lore-friendly.
descriptionHtml:
So you might have read the note inside Silent Moons Camp, that the Silent Moon Enchant would "transfer health from victim to the wielder like a vampire", only to find that it ONLY burns the victim? We all wondered why would the note mentioned its "vampiric ability".

Now here is the cure, Silent Moon Enchant does not only burn target, but also absorb their health under moonlight. Now feel the fear of your foes when night comes!
author: falco99
